about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Global Space Technologies Ltd (GSTL) is a Software Product Platform Company with focus on Enterprise Mobility SaaS based solutions, providing integrated software & hardware product platforms and solutions to enable large and medium enterprises embrace mobility & digital technology for their business enhancement.

The Company provides domain specific mobility & digital technology products by leveraging contemporary web, mobile technology, big data, analytics & custom hardware to deliver customizable and configurable solutions to different industry verticals. GSTL launched its flagship product for pharmaceutical industry in the year 2011. Its technology platform has been constantly evolving and now includes industry solutions in Banking, Financial Services, Insurance and Education. The company has a considerable client list, which includes some of the reputed pharma companies, banking conglomerates & large education groups i.e. Cipla, Maruti, Ipca, BoI, SBI, Glenmark, Bajaj etc.

contactDetails.full_address: Global Space Technologies Ltd, Office No. 605 6th floor A-1 B-Wing, Rupa Solitaire Bld Millennium Business Park, MIDC Mahape Navi Mumbai 400 710

faqs.question: What is the Global Space IPO?
faqs.answer:
Global Space IPO is a SME IPO of 3034000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹20.02 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹66 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on July 26, 2017, and closes on July 28, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Global Space IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Global Space IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Global Space IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Global Space IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Global Space IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Global Space IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Global Space IPO opens on July 26, 2017 and closes on July 28, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Global Space IPO?
faqs.answer: Global Space IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Global Space IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Global Space IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
